title: First Message
description: Client texted about urgent issue with production system

title: System Check
description: Immediately checked the production system status

title: Second Message
description: Client sent follow-up with more details about the problem

title: Issue Identified
description: Found the root cause - database connection timeout

title: Fix Applied
description: Deployed hotfix to resolve the database issue

title: Client Update
description: Texted client that issue is resolved

title: Confirmation
description: Client confirmed everything is working normally
